text: Marcus Junius Silanus (AD 14–54) was a senator in the Roman Empire. Despite his powerful influence,Cassius Dio, 60.1Ronald Syme, "Problems about Proconsuls of Asia", Zeitschrift für Papyrologie und Epigraphik, 53 (1983), p. 196 he could not survive the death of the Emperor. ==References== Category:14 births Category:54 deaths
title: Marcus Junius Silanus
